# Scroll Snap Align

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support     |
|-------------------------|-------------|
| `snap-start`            | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-end`              | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-center`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `snap-align-none`       | 🌐 Web only |
